summary: User had monolithic text-temp/texts.html with 8 text effects mixed with background/card styling â†’ Extracted into 12 modular, reusable text animation components (8 original + 4 new creative effects) in isolated HTML/CSS files
root_cause: Text effects were embedded in a single demo HTML file with presentation styling, making them unusable as modular UI components for Sementix typing indicators

solution.approach: Component extraction + creative expansion - isolated each animation into standalone CSS files with demo HTML, then designed 4 additional unique effects to expand the collection
key_changes: text-loaders/1-typewriter/: Classic cursor blinking + character-by-character typing with typewriter effect logic
text-loaders/2-glitch/: Cyberpunk RGB chromatic aberration with clip-path glitching
text-loaders/3-wave/: Per-character wave animation with gradient flow and dynamic span generation
text-loaders/4-matrix/: Green matrix rain with linear gradient overlay sweep
text-loaders/5-morph/: Letter-spacing morphing with blur + gradient position animation
text-loaders/6-flip-3d/: 3D perspective flipping with preserve-3d transforms
text-loaders/7-shimmer/: Horizontal light sweep with gradient background-clip
text-loaders/8-quantum/: Quantum superposition effect with split pseudo-elements
text-loaders/9-pulse/: NEW - Rhythmic heartbeat double-pulse with scale + glow intensity changes
text-loaders/10-neon-flicker/: NEW - Vintage neon sign with realistic random flicker timing
text-loaders/11-liquid-ripple/: NEW - Fluid wave distortion with scale morphing + flowing gradients
text-loaders/12-holo-scan/: NEW - Rainbow hologram with full-spectrum gradient + chromatic aberration

validation: Visual inspection of all 12 HTML files in browser - each effect displays correctly with isolated styling and text rotation

gotchas.issue: Wave effect requires dynamic DOM manipulation - each character must be wrapped in a span with animation-delay
gotchas.solution: Included JavaScript updateWaveText() function that splits text into individual span elements and applies staggered delays (i * 0.1s)

gotchas.issue: Glitch and quantum effects use data-text attribute for pseudo-element content
gotchas.solution: When rotating text, must update both element.textContent AND element.setAttribute('data-text', newText) to keep ::before/::after synced

gotchas.issue: Background-clip text effects require -webkit prefix for Safari compatibility
gotchas.solution: Always include both -webkit-background-clip: text and background-clip: text, plus -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent

lesson: Pure CSS animations with creative keyframe design can create highly engaging UI effects without JavaScript performance overhead. Modular component extraction makes effects reusable across different contexts (typing indicators, loading states, status messages). Pairing visual effects with thematic text rotation arrays creates cohesive user experiences.

key_patterns: @keyframes <animation-name> - CSS animation definitions with timing functions
background-clip: text - Gradient text fill technique with -webkit prefix
::before/::after + attr(data-text) - Pseudo-element duplication for layered effects
transform: scale/rotate/translate - 3D transform combinations for dynamic effects
text-shadow with rgba() - Multiple layered shadows for glow effects
setInterval() + fade transitions - Text rotation with smooth opacity transitions
api_surface: typewriterEffect(element, texts): void - Character-by-character typing with backspace
updateWaveText(text): void - Splits text into spans with staggered animation delays
rotateText(elementId, texts, interval): void - Generic text rotation with fade transitions
